The code for the transformations of

  • LAB
  • LUV
  • PolarLAB
  • PolarLUV
  • XYZ
  • Oklab
  • PolarOklab

were ported from the C code of the R colorspaces package, which is licensed under the 3-clause BSD license.

  • http://colorspace.r-forge.r-project.org/

and link to a mirror of the C file:

  • https://github.com/cran/colorspace/blob/master/src/colorspace.c

CIE-XYZ <-> Device independent RGB

R, G, and B give the levels of red, green and blue as values in the interval [0,1]. X, Y and Z give the CIE chromaticies. XN, YN, ZN gives the chromaticity of the white point.

Often approximated as 0.08856
Also, instead of the oft-used approximation 7.787, below uses
(kappa / 116)

Imports

colortypes

Consts

epsilon: float32 = 0.008856451679035631
kappa: float32 = 903.2962962962963
